    • Method Detail

      • createArmor

        @PostMapping
 @ResponseStatus(value=CREATED)
 @ResponseBody
public com.revature.trial_by_combat.models.Armor createArmor(@RequestBody
                                                                                                                            com.revature.trial_by_combat.models.Armor armor)
        Creates a piece of armor in the database. Sets armor price based on the armor's damage reduction.
        Parameters:
        armor - Armor object to be persisted in database.
        Returns:
        Returns a copy of the persisted object.
